document_data.mainbody: '''Kurdin''' was a powerful [[alaghi]] [[druid]] active in the forests of [[northwest Faer√ªn]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kurdin was a hermit, and was wise and exceptionally intelligent among the alaghi. He was rumored to have played a role in the destruction of [[Hellgate Keep]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Relationships: He was a close ally of the [[treant]]s of the [[Woods of Turlang]].
